thirdPartyId.title: Third-party Add-on Id
thirdPartyId.description: The identifier of the third party add-on which will override the app provided one. Should be of the format example@foo. If the third party engine is an OpenSearch engine, then this must be opensearch@search.mozilla.org

overridesId.title: Add-on Id to Override (original search config)
overridesId.description: The identifier of the app-provided add-on to be overridden. Should be of the format example@search.mozilla.org. This field is used for the original search configuration, and for some of the early Firefox versions that support search-config-v2.

overridesAppIdv2.title: Add-on Id to Override (search-config-v2)
overridesAppIdv2.description: The identifier of the app-provided add-on to be overridden. This field is for search-config-v2 support.

engineName.title: Engine Name
engineName.description: The name of the search engine to be overridden, only applies to OpenSearch engines

urls.title: URLs
urls.description: An array of URL sets which must be matched (with the add-on's manifest settings) to allow the override

search_form.title: search_form
search_form.description: Unsupported on Firefox at this time
